attributes.title: Badge Notification Field
attributes.readMe:
A notification-style badge that overlays a count on an icon (e.g., bell icon with notification count).

**Features:**
- Icon with overlaid notification badge
- Circular badge positioning (top-right)
- Integer counts (default: 0 decimals)
- Limited range display (default: 0-99)
- Custom label for context

**Display Style:**
- Small notification badge (atom view): 14px badge on 16px icon
- Large notification badge (embedded view): 24px badge on 40px icon with label
- Badge color: Red (destructive) for attention
- White border for contrast against backgrounds

**Use Cases:**
- Unread notifications (ðŸ”” 3)
- Message counts
- Alert indicators
- Pending items
